sentence: The large dog ran across the garden.
She quickly finished her homework.
The red car stopped at the traffic light.
He gave the book to his friend.
The cat jumped over the fence.
I saw her at the store yesterday.
The beautiful butterfly landed on the flower.
She and her sister went to the movie.
The teacher explained the lesson clearly.
He shouted loudly to get attention.
The old man walked slowly with his cane.
She bought a new dress for the party.
The children played happily in the park.
They went to the beach but forgot sunscreen.
The bird sang sweetly from the tree.
That book belongs to me.
The brave knight fought the dragon.
She carefully placed the vase on the table.
He always arrives before the meeting starts.
The team cheered when they won the game.
